description: Allows the user to report and update System Defined Attributes (SDAs) cycle counts and durations for materials in the Bill of Materials, reducing the specified SDA by the given amount.
intent: Capture and apply updates to system defined attribute values for selected materials, based on author-specified rules.
postconditions: Specified SDAs for selected materials are updated according to configured update rules
side_effects: Supports background execution when Auto Complete Phase is selected
example_usage: Operator selects a material in the Material ID grid, expands its SDAs, chooses to decrement the cycle count SDA by a recipe variable, selects a confirmation type, and clicks Finish to apply the update.
